english.segment1: The world ends without a tragedy. Time is melting into history
english.segment2: The sky is falling. Voices crying out in desperation. Hear them calling. Everybody, save yourself
english.segment3: The world plays its angered symphony. Lost inside eternal mystery
english.segment4: Doesn't matter what you say. Doesn't matter what you do. We all end up this way. There's one thing left to save you
english.segment5: The sky is falling. Voices crying out in desperation. Here them calling. You can never save yourself
